shortdesc.ph: Retrieves detailed information of the specified music resource.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific music resource.

p.codeblock: virtual int getSongSimpleInfo(agora::util::AString& requestId, int64_t songCode) = 0;

section.p: Before calling this method, you need to obtain the song code of the target music resource. You can do this by calling or , and retrieve the song code from the callback triggered by these methods. After calling this method, the SDK triggers the callback to return the detailed information of the music resource.

Before calling this method, you need to obtain the identifier of the target music resource. You can get the music resource by calling getMusicCollectionByMusicChartId or searchMusic, and obtain the identifier (songCode) from the triggered callback.
section.note: After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the detailed information of the music resource.
